HotelElement.Name: NH Berlin Kreuzberg (Formerly NH Heinrich Heine)

Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at NH Berlin Heinrich Heine, you'll be centrally located in Berlin, convenient to Nikolaikirche and Alexanderplatz. This family-friendly hotel is close to Checkpoint Charlie Museum and Brandenburg Gate.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 38 guestrooms, featuring kitchens with refrigerators and stovetops. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities, which include complimentary wireless Internet access and a television in the lobby.

Dining
Take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours).

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, complimentary newspapers in the lobby, and dry cleaning/laundry services. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is noon
Take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours).
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Nikolaikirche - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Red Town Hall - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Alexa Shopping Center - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Schlossplatz - 1.6 km / 1 mi

Berlin Conference Center - 1.6 km / 1 mi
TV Tower - 1.6 km / 1 mi

German Cathedral - 1.7 km / 1.1 mi

Emil Nolde Museum - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi

The nearest airports are:
Berlin (TXL-Tegel) - 9.6 km / 6 mi
Berlin (SXF-Schoenefeld) - 14.5 km / 9 mi

The preferred airport for NH Berlin Heinrich Heine is Berlin (TXL-Tegel).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
